body: If you work for an agency or arm's length body, refer to the guidance on your local intranet.

components.html: To report an IT incident, for example a lost or stolen device, or unauthorised access to an IT system, call 0800 917 5148.

You should report all security incidents, including:

- loss of personal information
- unauthorised access to documents
- items left unsecured, like a key cabinet
- suspicious people, vehicles or packages

## Report a security incident by email

You need to [complete this form](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1W96cpkomUjSQH5qca-SGsUcvqpMfJa85/view?usp=sharing) and email it to [security@justice.gov.uk](#).

## Report a security incident anonymously

If you're concerned about providing your name and contact details, you can [report a security incident anonymously](/).




Read our [security policy](#).

heading: Report a security incident
lede: To protect the public and maintain trust in the system, it is important to report a security incident as soon as you know about it.
